pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, May 11, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Secretary General of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie, Louise Mushikiwabo.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

Toronto, Ontario

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the celebration of life for John Honderich.

Closed to media
